content: **summary** a historic pattern located in the north dakota state university library s germans from russia heritage collection this pattern is available online for free and was transcribed and prepared for the web by connie dahlke in 2004 **additional size information** one size finished dimensions approximately 12 5 in diameter **additional yarn information** pattern calls for size 20 thread examples of this thread on ravelry include aunt lydia s fine crochet thread 1 **additional gauge information** gauge is not listed 1 http //www ravelry com/yarns/library/aunt-lydias-fine-crochet-thread-size-20
